headline: United Parcel Service (UPS) Is Up 6.3% After Margin-Focused Earnings Beat From Efficiency Reimagined
summary: United Parcel Service recently reported quarterly results that exceeded analyst expectations on revenue, EPS and EBITDA, helped by its early-stage Efficiency Reimagined turnaround plan and cost-cutting measures, including facility closures and automation investments. A key element of this shift is UPS reducing low- and negative-margin Amazon volume while prioritizing higher-margin healthcare and small and medium-sized business deliveries, which is beginning to show up in improved operating...

headline: Air cargo contractor reimburses Postal Service for fraudulent billing
summary: Regional airline Air Cargo Carriers has paid a settlement to resolve charges it defrauded the U.S. Postal Service by fudging time stamps to hide late deliveries. The post Air cargo contractor reimburses Postal Service for fraudulent billing appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: New Owner Takes Possession of PostalAnnex in Irvine, California -Continuing 21 Year Legacy of Shipping and Office Services
summary: Annex Brands, Inc., a leading franchisor in the packing, shipping, and office services industries, is pleased to announce the successful transfer of ownership of an existing 21- year-old PostalAnnex location in Irvine, CA to new owner, Navsher Singh. This transition to new ownership ensures that the community will benefit from the essential shipping and office services provided by this PostalAnnex location.
